verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

And thou <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, wilt thou judge <S%H8199><s%>, wilt thou judge <S%H8199><s%> the bloody <S%H1818><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>? then cause her to know <S%H3045><s%> all her abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

And thou shalt say <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>: A city <S%H5892><s%> that sheddeth <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of her <S%H6256><s%>, that her time may come <S%H935><s%>, and that maketh <S%H6213><s%> idols <S%H1544><s%> against herself to defile her <S%H2930><s%>!

Thou art become guilty <S%H816><s%> in thy blood <S%H1818><s%> that thou hast shed <S%H8210><s%>, and art defiled <S%H2930><s%> in thine idols <S%H1544><s%> which thou hast made <S%H6213><s%>; and thou hast caused thy days <S%H3117><s%> to draw near <S%H7126><s%>, and art come <S%H935><s%> even unto thy years <S%H8141><s%>: therefore have I made <S%H5414><s%> thee a reproach <S%H2781><s%> unto the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and a mocking <S%H7048><s%> to all the countries <S%H776><s%>.
Those that are near <S%H7138><s%>, and those that are far <S%H7350><s%> from thee <S%H7046><s%>, shall mock thee <S%H2931><s%>, thou infamous one and full <S%H7227><s%> of tumult <S%H4103><s%>.
Behold <S%H5387><s%>, the princes of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> according to his power <S%H2220><s%>, have been in thee to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>.

In thee have they set light <S%H7043><s%> by father <S%H1><s%> and mother <S%H517><s%>; in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee have they dealt <S%H6213><s%> by oppression <S%H6233><s%> with the sojourner <S%H1616><s%>; in thee have they wronged <S%H3238><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and the widow <S%H490><s%>.
Thou hast despised <S%H959><s%> my holy things <S%H6944><s%>, and hast profaned <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>.

Slanderous <S%H7400><s%> men <S%H582><s%> have been in thee to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>; and in thee they have eaten <S%H398><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>: in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee they have committed <S%H6213><s%> lewdness <S%H2154><s%>.
In thee have they uncovered <S%H1540><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%>' nakedness <S%H6172><s%>; in thee have they humbled <S%H6031><s%> her that was unclean <S%H5079><s%> in her impurity <S%H2931><s%>.

And one <S%H376><s%> hath committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> with his neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>; and another <S%H376><s%> hath lewdly <S%H2154><s%> defiled <S%H2930><s%> his daughter-in <S%H3618><s%>-law; and another <S%H376><s%> in thee hath humbled <S%H6031><s%> his sister <S%H269><s%>, his father <S%H1><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>.

In thee have they taken <S%H3947><s%> bribes <S%H7810><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>; thou hast taken <S%H3947><s%> interest <S%H5392><s%> and increase <S%H8636><s%>, and thou hast greedily gained <S%H1214><s%> of thy neighbors <S%H7453><s%> by oppression <S%H6233><s%>, and hast forgotten <S%H7911><s%> me <S%H5002><s%>, saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

Behold <S%H5221><s%>, therefore, I have smitten my hand <S%H3709><s%> at thy dishonest gain <S%H1215><s%> which thou hast made <S%H6213><s%>, and at thy blood <S%H1818><s%> which hath been in the midst of thee <S%H8432><s%>.

Can thy heart <S%H3820><s%> endure <S%H5975><s%>, or can thy hands <S%H3027><s%> be strong <S%H2388><s%>, in the days <S%H3117><s%> that I shall deal <S%H6213><s%> with thee <S%H3068><s%>? I, Jehovah, have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it <S%H6213><s%>, and will do it.

And I will scatter <S%H6327><s%> thee among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and disperse <S%H2219><s%> thee through the countries <S%H776><s%>; and I will consume <S%H8552><s%> thy filthiness out of thee <S%H2932><s%>.
And thou shalt be profaned <S%H2490><s%> in thyself <S%H5869><s%>, in the sight of the nations <S%H1471><s%>; and thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is become dross <S%H5509><s%> unto me <S%H5178><s%>: all of them are brass and tin <S%H913><s%> and iron <S%H1270><s%> and lead <S%H5777><s%>, in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace <S%H3564><s%>; they are the dross <S%H5509><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>: Because ye are all become dross <S%H5509><s%>, therefore <S%H6908><s%>, behold, I will gather you into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

As they gather <S%H6910><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> and brass <S%H5178><s%> and iron <S%H1270><s%> and lead <S%H5777><s%> and tin <S%H913><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace <S%H3564><s%>, to blow <S%H5301><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> upon it <S%H5413><s%>, to melt it <S%H6908><s%>; so will I gather you in mine anger <S%H639><s%> and in my wrath <S%H2534><s%>, and I will lay <S%H3240><s%> you there <S%H5413><s%>, and melt you.
Yea <S%H3664><s%>, I will gather you <S%H5301><s%>, and blow upon you with the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath <S%H5678><s%>, and ye shall be melted <S%H5413><s%> in the midst thereof <S%H8432><s%>.

As silver <S%H3701><s%> is melted <S%H2046><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace <S%H3564><s%>, so shall ye be melted <S%H5413><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof <S%H3045><s%>; and ye shall know that I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, have poured out <S%H8210><s%> my wrath upon you <S%H2534><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, say <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H776><s%>, Thou art a land that is not cleansed <S%H2891><s%>, nor rained <S%H1656><s%> upon in the day <S%H3117><s%> of indignation <S%H2195><s%>.

There is a conspiracy <S%H7195><s%> of her prophets <S%H5030><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof <S%H7580><s%>, like a roaring lion <S%H738><s%> ravening <S%H2963><s%> the prey <S%H2964><s%>: they have devoured <S%H398><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%>; they take <S%H3947><s%> treasure <S%H2633><s%> and precious things <S%H3366><s%>; they have made her widows <S%H490><s%> many <S%H7235><s%> in the midst thereof <S%H8432><s%>.

Her priests <S%H3548><s%> have done violence <S%H2554><s%> to my law <S%H8451><s%>, and have profaned <S%H2490><s%> my holy things <S%H6944><s%>: they have made no distinction <S%H914><s%> between the holy <S%H6944><s%> and the common <S%H2455><s%>, neither have they caused men to discern <S%H3045><s%> between the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%>, and have hid <S%H5956><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> from my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, and I am profaned <S%H2490><s%> among them <S%H8432><s%>.

Her princes <S%H8269><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> thereof are like wolves <S%H2061><s%> ravening <S%H2963><s%> the prey <S%H2964><s%>, to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>, and to destroy <S%H6><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%>, that they may get <S%H1214><s%> dishonest gain <S%H1215><s%>.

And her prophets <S%H5030><s%> have daubed <S%H2902><s%> for them with untempered <S%H8602><s%> mortar <S%H2374><s%>, seeing false <S%H7723><s%> visions <S%H7080><s%>, and divining lies <S%H3577><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, saying, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, when Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath not spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

The people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> have used oppression <S%H6231><s%>, and exercised <S%H1497><s%> robbery <S%H1498><s%>; yea <S%H3238><s%>, they have vexed the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>, and have oppressed <S%H6231><s%> the sojourner <S%H1616><s%> wrongfully <S%H4941><s%>.

And I sought <S%H1245><s%> for a man <S%H376><s%> among them <S%H1443><s%>, that should build up the wall <S%H1447><s%>, and stand <S%H5975><s%> in the gap <S%H6556><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me for the land <S%H776><s%>, that I should not destroy <S%H7843><s%> it <S%H4672><s%>; but I found none.

Therefore have I poured out <S%H8210><s%> mine indignation <S%H2195><s%> upon them <S%H3615><s%>; I have consumed them with the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath <S%H5678><s%>: their own way <S%H1870><s%> have I brought <S%H5414><s%> upon their heads <S%H7218><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.
